explains: n. 公平，公正；白皙，浅色

sentences.en: Americans have an innate sense of fairness.
sentences.cn: 美国人有一种天生的公平感。

sentences.en: He has a good overall sense of justice and fairness.
sentences.cn: 他有良好的公正和公平的整体意识。

sentences.en: Her introduction is a model of fairness, a lively summation of Irish history.
sentences.cn: 她的导论是公正的典范，是对爱尔兰历史的总结。
